scripts.asbuild:js: asc assembly/index.ts -j build/as_nbody.js -O3 --runtime stub --noAssert --use abort= && node scripts/postprocess-js
scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:wasm && npm run asbuild:js
scripts.rsbuild: cd rust && RUSTFLAGS='-C link-arg=-s' cargo +nightly build --release
scripts.build: npm run asbuild && npm run tsbuild && npm run rsbuild
